name: SimpleVestingNonRevocable
description: SingleTokenVesting. A token holder contract that can release its token balance gradually like a typical vesting scheme, with a cliff and vesting period. Optionally revocable by the guardian. Only tracks vesting for a single token, rather than all ERC20s.

functionDecorators.name: __SingleTokenVestingNonRevocable_init
functionDecorators.description: Creates a vesting contract that vests its balance of any ERC20 token to the beneficiary, gradually in a linear fashion until start + duration. By then all of the balance will have vested.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the token to vest.

parameterDecorators.name: beneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: address of the beneficiary to whom vested tokens are transferred.

parameterDecorators.name: start
parameterDecorators.description: the time (as Unix time) at which point vesting starts.

parameterDecorators.name: cliffDuration
parameterDecorators.description: duration in seconds of the cliff in which tokens will begin to vest.

parameterDecorators.name: duration
parameterDecorators.description: duration in seconds of the period in which the tokens will vest.

returnDecorators.description: the cliff time of the token vesting.
the duration of the token vesting.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: paused
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

returnDecorators.description: the amount of the token released.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

returnDecorators.description: the start time of the token vesting.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
